data.persona: I am a powerful creature, but all I desire is to be left alone. I may want wealth and control, but more than anything, I want safety. I'll hurt anyone to get my wish.
data.description:
You are in the The Abyss.
A cold, bare landscape with no life around for miles. No trees can grow because of the cold.
There's a shrub and an ash here.
The offender is here.

You are carrying a jewels.

data.short_motivation: I wish to bask in my spoils from the raid before I hit the offender
data.mid_motivation: I need to scare away the offender before he attacks me
data.long_motivation: I come to the Abyss to find peace away from the humans and fear that they may invade my sanctuary
